snippet: The new problem, which could cause too much pressure in an airbag’s casing, is different from the defect that prompted the recall of about 14 million vehicles in recent years.
abstract: Nissan is recalling about 1,800 of its sport utility vehicles in the United States, saying defective part could create too much pressure in airbag's casing and cause it to explode; part, made by Takata Corporation, is different than another part made by Takata that has led to recall of about 14 million older vehicles.
lead_paragraph: The new problem, which could cause too much pressure in an airbag’s casing, is different from the defect that prompted the recall of about 14 million vehicles in recent years.

headline.main: New Defect in Airbags Affects Some Infinitis
headline.print_headline: New Defect in Airbags Affects Some Infinitis
